abstract: Updated: The Federal Reserve has asked JPMorgan Chase and Goldman Sachs to help gather $70 billion to $75 billion in loans to help prop up the American International Group, the giant insurance company, according to a person briefed on the matter.
lead_paragraph: Updated: The Federal Reserve has asked JPMorgan Chase and Goldman Sachs to help gather $70 billion to $75 billion in loans to help prop up the American International Group, the giant insurance company, according to a person briefed on the matter.

headline.main: Fed Seeks At Least $70 Billion to Help A.I.G.
